duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide in-depth product support with excellent customer service for financial products such as securities, mutual funds, and cash management.
Handle customer inquiries, resolving support issues, and document customer information and recurring technical issues.
Work with internal teams, including the technical support team, to triage and resolve customer issues.
Ability to work occasional weekends and overtime as needed by the business.

education_certification.credential: FINRA Series 7 and Series 63 (required within the first 90 days of employment)
